entry.title: aaronparecki.com
entry.content:
In this episode Eddie interviews Aaron Parecki, one of the co-founders of the IndieWeb. We talk about how the IndieWeb got started, what makes an IndieWebCamp particularly memorable and how he decides if a new feature should be a public service or part of his website.

  • Service: IndieLogin
  • Service: Telegraph (Sending Webmentions)
  • Service: Webmention.io (Receive Webmentions)
  • Aaron was able to attend IndieWebCamp NYC 2018
  • IndieWebCamp Nuremberg 2018 is coming soon
  • Micro.blog, an easy way to get started in the IndieWeb
  • Screenshot of Aaronâ€™s trip status on his website
  • Article: Sending your First Webmention from Scratch
  • Article: An IndieWeb reader: My new home on the internet
  • Aaron completed some initial work on his Address Book
entry.summary: In this episode Eddie interviews Aaron Parecki, one of the co-founders of the IndieWeb. We talk about how the IndieWeb got started, what makes an IndieWebCamp particularly memorable and how he decides if a new feature should be a public service or part of his website.

entry.title: Teaser Trailer
entry.content: A teaser trailer for the upcoming My Url Is podcast. Episode 1 is available on October 3, 2018.
